item.title: Twine - RSS Reader on the App Store
item.description: It’s clean, it’s functional, and actually feels like a news app. Some RSS Feeds can feel a little like “checking your email” but this one actually feels like reading a news or social media feed. Now that they’ve Import/Export it has all the basic functionality I could really ask for.
